title: Introduction to Tajweed
description: Learn the basics of Tajweed and why it's important

content.introduction: Tajweed is the science of proper Quranic recitation.

sections.title: What is Tajweed?
sections.content: Tajweed means to improve, to make better. In the context of the Quran, it means to recite it properly, giving each letter its rights and dues.

sections.title: Importance of Tajweed
sections.content: Learning Tajweed is obligatory for every Muslim who wants to recite the Quran correctly.

title: Rules of Noon Sakinah
description: Learn the four rules of Noon Sakinah and Tanween

content.introduction: Noon Sakinah and Tanween have four main rules.

sections.title: Izhar (Clear pronunciation)
sections.content: When followed by throat letters: ء، ه، ع، ح، غ، خ

sections.title: Idgham (Merging)
sections.content: When followed by: ي، ر، م، ل، و، ن

sections.title: Ikhfa (Concealment)
sections.content: When followed by the remaining 15 letters
